subject: Simsonn Plus X Pedals Stock in EU Warehouse
description_text:
Hello,

I am interested in purchasing a Simsonn Plus X. I live in an EU
country (Portugal), so I would like to know where the package would be
shipped from. I have read that Simsonn has at least one warehouse in
the EU and is working on building another. So, if I buy from the
simsonn.com website, will it be shipped from within the EU?

Thank you for your time,

Regards,
José

conversations.body_text: Hi José Sousa,    Our German warehouse has now received stock of the PlusX. If you place your order now, it will be shipped directly from Germany.      You can also add a note saying "Ship from Germany" when placing your order to help us process it more efficiently.
